roleset.name: apply pressure to a surface
roleset.note: RUB-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus, comparison with 'load'. Member of VNcls spray-9.7-1, wipe_manner-10.4.1-1, crane-40.3.2, touch-20-1. (from rub.01-v)

role.descr: rubbed with, if separate from agent

example.name: with locative PP
example.text: To reduce it at the fund 's building , workers rubbed beeswax instead of polyurethane on the floors in the executive director 's office .
example.arg: on the floors in the executive director 's office

example.name: transitive
example.text: However , the thought of a living player selling his checks rubs some people the wrong way .
example.arg: the thought of a living player selling his checks

example.name: Arg0,1,3
example.text: The only testimony to establish the alleged accident is the statement by the deceased to his first physician, who first treated the abrasion, that he thought the abrasion was caused by his rubbing his toe with a towel.
